div.div: Customer Questions & Answers

div.span: Share your thoughts with other customers

a.span: "A GOOD PURSE ON A BEST PRICE......"

div.div:
Hello
<<< INTRODUCTION >>>
My mother own this product. My mother is a big fan of purses and sarees. She is using this purse for over two months. Now I think, it is time to post the review of it. So, here is it. In this review, I am expressing my views shortly and point-by-point, as it would be comfortable for the customers to read. All the views expressed in this review are solely my own.
<<< PROS >>>
Fabulous design.
Stitches are perfect and proper.
Light weight.
Long-lasting.
Very spacious interiors.
The red color is nice and cute.
Gives a grand look.
Inner cloth is very soft and smooth.
Build quality and material quality is nice.
Highly recommended to the ladies, who love cross bags.
It may look small in size, but it is just enough and it holds your wallet, smartphone, papers, keys, glasses, etc., etc.
The zip is very convenient and comfy.
You can adjust the strap of the purse by yourself according to your wish.
Descent price tag.
1 year warranty.
Good to have the 'Amazon Fulfilled' logo.
<<< CONS >>>
Carelessness may damage the zips.
Water may damage the body.
<<< VERDICT >>>
Awesome product. Really like it a lot. The cons are just probabilities. A good carer can increase its durability. The colour is also so cute. The soft interior need special compliments. Price is highly acceptable for this quality purse. Totally, a cool product.
I HOPE YOU FOUND MY REVIEW HELPFUL. IF "YES", KINDLY HIT THAT "YES" BUTTON
IF YOU HAVE ANY DOUBTS OR QUESTIONS, PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME (MY CONTACT INFORMATIONS ARE GIVEN IN MY PROFILE)
^^ HAVE A GREAT DAY ^^
